messages.message: @Matt Weaver I am looking to get them to 22.05 if we are going to import the whole set of images and get an upgrade going instead versus having an upgrade to the latest set of images for 22.01. :slightly_smiling_face: I will reach out if there is anything needed on this.
@lenny for confirmation, you did mention the backport to both 22.01 and 22.05 was done with your PR. Can you tell me what the tag in 22.05 that has these fixes?

i believe there have been several builds of 22.05 since the backport was merged. if we already sent 22.05 images to HSBC, can you tell me what the tag on those images is and i can check if it includes the backport? if not, then the latest 22.05 release should work

@lenny the image list I shared was earlier than 20th July so it would be before the backport conversation we had. I just wanted to provided an updated image list to them so that we can instead look for an upgrade to 22.05 on the dev environment with these changes.
here's the tag for the most recent 22.05.0 build: `22.05.0-73b56c61dc`
